param.name: ref_selector
param.label: Choose the source for the reference genome

validator.message: A built-in reference genome is not available for the build associated with the selected input file

param.name: method
param.label: Select the sequencing method of the input file(s)

param.name: access
param.label: Sequencing-accessible genomic regions, or exons to use as possible targets

param.name: bp_per_bin
param.label: Desired average number of sequencing read bases mapped to each bin.
param.help: only use integers, don't use fractures

param.name: target_max_size
param.label: Maximum size of target bins.
param.help: only use integers, don't use fractures

param.name: target_min_size
param.label: Minimum size of target bins.
param.help: only use integers, don't use fractures

param.name: antitarget_max_size
param.label: Maximum size of antitarget bins.
param.help: only use integers, don't use fractures

param.name: antitarget_min_size
param.label: Minimum size of antitarget bins.
param.help: only use integers, don't use fractures

param.name: annotate
param.label: Use gene models from this file to assign names to the target regions.
param.help: Format: UCSC refFlat.txt or ensFlat.txt file (preferred), or BED, interval list, GFF, or similar.

param.name: short_names
param.label: Reduce multi-accession bait labels to be short and consistent

param.name: target_output_bed
param.label: Filename for target BED output.
param.help: If not specified, constructed from the input file basename.

param.name: antitarget_output_bed
param.label: Filename for antitarget BED output.
param.help: If not specified, constructed from the input file basename.
